markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pushing Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=2925) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) trait. It gains the [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=25) action for that attack.
name: Pushing Attack
